strings.Value: Tried to understand, based on what we've seen, what kind of spell Kalannah used to get away, and where it could bring her.
Tried to find anyone who could have seen these despicable people.
Searched for signs or trails that our abducted companion could have left for us.
Without searching for other ways to simplify our work, we followed the trail of the Technic League.

The insidious henchmen of the ominous {g|Technic League}Technic League{/g} have disappeared into the thick wilderness of the mysterious {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g}! But not for long! Soon we'd be upon them. First, though, we'd have to pick up their trail. To do that, we...

We easily realized that the spell Kalannah used to flee had a small range â€” no further than six hundred feet. We checked our surroundings in this range and quickly found the place she teleported to, as well as a trail leading from there. Inspired by our success, we...
Unfortunately, a spell is such an elusive thing, it can hardly be called a thing at all. No matter how hard we thought, we still had no idea what exactly she used. We had to find another way. We...

Hooray for spycraft! Not far from the abduction site, we found a familiar token our companion must have dropped, and a little farther along, a scrap of cloth, obviously torn off intentionally. Now, knowing which direction to search, we...
Either no one ever told our companion tales of breadcrumbs, or we didn't look carefully enough, but we couldn't find any trails. But there are other ways to search! We...

This wilderness only seems deserted at first glance. Wandering around the area, we met a few mushroom gatherers and hunters, who told us where they'd seen our quarry. We hadn't discovered the exact position of their camp, but we were closing in. After this we...

Sadly, the wild woods of the {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g} are not like city streets, where you can talk to passers-by, go to the tavern, question the drunkards and order a beer. In the whole area we only met a single mushroom gatherer, who seemed suspicious that we were armed, turned around and ran. No one was going to help us, so we...

As I have written before, the {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g} are a mystery covered in thicket, and not just any thicket, but an especially dense one. The henchmen of the ominous {g|Technic League}Technic League{/g} (who, as we recall, are insidious) used this peculiarity of the landscape to cover their trail. We wandered in the forest for a long time, soaked our feet in a swamp, and got scratched all over by wild raspberry, but at last we found their camp.

The henchmen of the ominous {g|Technic League}Technic League{/g} are truly insidious, and the {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g}, a mysterious thicket. But true heroes think nothing of such things! We easily picked up the trail of those scoundrels, and soon found their camp.
